helptext.subtitle: How to use ImageCropper
helptext.second: For using the ImageCropper first choose an image from your computer. Please click "Choose Image".
helptext.third: By using the red buttons you can rotate, flip or zoom the image. The rotation can also be changed manually in 1 degree increments with the input field. The aspect ratios can also be changed.
helptext.fourth: You can reset all changes with the "Reset" button.
